comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The initials scratched on the negative emulsion probably should read not W. M. but "WM.," the abbreviation for William; i.e., Wm. H. Reynolds, former senator, wheeler-dealer: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9406E5DC103AE4... Portrait, with mustache? --- www.coneyislandhistory.org/collection/index.php?g=detail&...
